attributes.comment:
I am truely against the increase in the fees. I am a waiting adoptive parent,
adopting from China. The wait time has increase significantly. I have already
been fingerprinted and have a I-171H. However, I will have to apply for another and
get refingerprinted due to the expirations on the documents. I have never gotten to
use the one I have already paid for. This mean that I will have to pay twice for
fingerprints and twice for my I-171H. By increasing the fees I will even have to pay
more. I have an average family income, trying to have a family through adoption.
This is the only way for my husband and I to have a child. It is very difficult
process and then to add more to this is very frustrating.

Thank you for taking the time to let me voice my opinion.

Stacy Battaglini
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Stacy Battaglini
